block.p: Suzanne Meredith Berman, the daughter of Sara Jane and Norman Berman of East Williston, N.Y., was married last evening to Robert Daniel Gardos, a son of Lorraine and Richard Gardos of Commack, N.Y. Rabbi Arturo Kalfus performed the ceremony at Temple Judea in Manhasset, N.Y.
The bride and bridegroom, both 28, graduated from the University of Pennsylvania, where they met.

Suzanne Meredith Berman, the daughter of Sara Jane and Norman Berman of East Williston, N.Y., was married last evening to Robert Daniel Gardos, a son of Lorraine and Richard Gardos of Commack, N.Y. Rabbi Arturo Kalfus performed the ceremony at Temple Judea in Manhasset, N.Y.
The bride and bridegroom, both 28, graduated from the University of Pennsylvania, where they met.
The bride received an M.B.A. from New York University on earlier this month. In 1997 and 1998, she was a media planner at Ogilvy & Mather, the advertising agency, in New York.
The bridegroom is the vice president for technology at Register.com, a Web site name registry in New York.
